alert.note: Alert for Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 24 at 4:35AM CDT until July 25 at 9:06AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... Turkey River at Spillville affecting Winneshiek County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Turkey River at Spillville. * WHEN...From this morning to late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 10.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.7 feet on 03/30/1960. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 445 PM CDT.
